Industrial Ergonomic Stools
================================

**Tender Information**

* **Solicitation number**: WS3785774421
* **Publication date**: January 5, 2023
* **Closing date and time**: March 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment number**: 2
* **Modification date**: February 13, 2023

**Request for Proposal Details**

* **Notice type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Option**: Canada option for additional units of up to 65

**Supply Requirements**

* **Quantity**: 130 Industrial Ergonomic Stools
* **Deliver to**: Fleet Maintenance Facility CAPE BRETON (FMF CB) at 666 Dundermire Rd, Victoria, BC V9A 7N2
* **Use**: Production Department

**Procurement Category and Selection Criteria**

* **Procurement category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Selection criteria**: Lowest Price

**Contracting and End-User Entity Information**

* **Contracting entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
	+ Contact: Cress, Christine (SPAC/PSPC), christine.cress@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **End-user entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)
	+ Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Additional Information**

* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15054804?extsite=MTUwNTQ4MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15054804?extsite=MTUwNTQ4MDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
